Class Editor

  • public class Editor
extends GameObject
    the editor class is used to give the editor mode it functionality some of the methods in this class are described below.

    • Method Detail

      • initSet

        public void initSet(Level level,
           float FOV,
           Control control)
        Sets some variables needed to use the editor. Control and field of view cannot be altered outside of this method, because they do not need to be changed after initialization.
        Parameters:
        level - Initial Level of that is loaded into the editor
        FOV - Field of view of the camera: used to calculate the cursor position.
        control - User input used to control the editor

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(Level level)
        Sets the maze
        Parameters:
        maze - Maze

      • getHorAngle

        public double getHorAngle()
        Returns the horizontal angle of the orientation.
        Returns:
        the horAngle

        Returns the vertical angle of the orientation.
        Returns:

      • getLevel

        public Level getLevel()
        Returns the level that is being edited
        Returns:
        the edited level

      • setEditMode

        public void setEditMode(EditMode editMode)
        Sets the mode of the editor to a certain mode.
        Parameters:
        editMode - new edit mode

      • update

        public void update(int screenWidth,
          int screenHeight)
        Updates the editor according to the inputs and current mode of the editor.

        In order, these actions are taken:

        1. The new camera position is calculated. The camera can be moved by dragging the right mouse button and by rotating the mouse wheel.
        2. The new Cursor position is calculated: The cursor highlights the top element of the maze stack over which the mouse is currently hovering.
        3. Actions are taken if the mouse is clicked, dragged or released according to the current edit mode.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - Width of the current window
        screenHeight - Height of the current window

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Selects a file with a JFileChooser and save the maze to this file.
        Returns:
        boolean the represents whether the save was successfull.

      • readLevel

        public static Level readLevel()
        Selects a file with a JFileChooser and reads the maze from this file. If the file selection is cancelled or otherwise interrupted, null is returned.
        Returns:
        Maze that was read from the chosen file.

      • readMazeObject

        public static CustomMazeObject readMazeObject()
        Reads in a custom maze object from an .obj file in the object folder.
        Returns:
        The Custom maze that was read in.
